Generated Narrative: SearchParameter person-name

PersonNameSearchParameter

Parameter name:string

Searches for Person based on full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?name={name}

ResourcePerson
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPerson
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: PersonNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for Person based on full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Person?name={name}
